statements: SELECT * FROM genetic_variations ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT id, gene_name FROM genetic_variations WHERE variation_type = 'SNP';
SELECT * FROM genetic_variations WHERE amino_acid_change LIKE '%Gly%';
SELECT gene_name, amino_acid_change FROM genetic_variations WHERE reference_genome = 'GRCh38';
SELECT id, variation_type, reference_genome FROM genetic_variations ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM genetic_variations WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT gene_name, variation_type, amino_acid_change FROM genetic_variations WHERE reference_genome = 'GRCh38';
SELECT DISTINCT gene_name FROM genetic_variations WHERE variation_type = 'insertion';
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_variations FROM genetic_variations WHERE reference_genome = 'GRCh37';
SELECT gene_name, COUNT(*) AS total_variations FROM genetic_variations GROUP BY gene_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_variations DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeneticVariations;
SELECT variation_name, gene_name FROM GeneticVariations WHERE mutation_type='insertion';
SELECT gene_name, variation_name FROM GeneticVariations ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM MutationAnalysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT analysis_id, patient_id, analysis_result FROM MutationAnalysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeneticVariations WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1';
SELECT * FROM MutationAnalysis WHERE patient_id = 123 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT variation_name, gene_name FROM GeneticVariations WHERE mutation_type = 'missense';
SELECT analysis_result FROM MutationAnalysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_analysis FROM MutationAnalysis;
SELECT * FROM Variations;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type FROM Variations WHERE impact='High';
SELECT * FROM Samples WHERE tissue_type='Lung' ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(sample_id) AS num_samples FROM Samples GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT Annotations.annotation_text, Annotations.annotator, Variations.gene_name FROM Annotations INNER JOIN Variations ON Annotations.variation_id = Variations.id;
SELECT * FROM Variations WHERE impact='High' ORDER BY gene_name ASC, position DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type, chromosome FROM Variations WHERE mutation_type='Missense' AND chromosome='X' ORDER BY position ASC

SELECT Samples.sample_id, Samples.tissue_type, Samples.quality, Annotations.annotation_text FROM Samples INNER JOIN Annotations ON Samples.sample_id = Annotations.variation_id WHERE Samples.quality='Good' AND Annotations.annotator='John Doe' ORDER BY Samples.sample_date DESC
SELECT gene_name, COUNT(id) AS total_variations FROM Variations GROUP BY gene_name ORDER BY total_variations DESC
SELECT DISTINCT Samples.tissue_type, COUNT(Samples.sample_id) AS sample_count FROM Samples GROUP BY Samples.tissue_type HAVING sample_count > 5 ORDER BY sample_count DESC
SELECT * FROM variations ORDER BY variation_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type FROM variations WHERE mutation_type='Substitution'
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender='Male'
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM treatments WHERE cost < 1000
SELECT * FROM studies ORDER BY publication_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM variations WHERE mutation_type = 'Missense' ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM treatments WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM studies WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01' AND publication_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN variations ON patients.patient_id = variations.variation_id;
SELECT * FROM genetic_variations;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type, chromosome_number FROM genetic_variations WHERE mutation_type = 'missense';
SELECT id, effect_type, phenotype FROM mutation_effects ORDER BY impact_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_studies WHERE study_type = 'clinical trial' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT gene_name, function_description FROM gene_functions WHERE function_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM genetic_variations WHERE chromosome_number = 1;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type FROM genetic_variations WHERE nucleotide_change = 'A>G';
SELECT * FROM mutation_effects WHERE effect_type = 'missense' AND impact_score > 3;
SELECT * FROM research_studies ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT gene_name, function_description FROM gene_functions WHERE gene_name LIKE 'BRCA%';
